name: CTRL BASE ZERO
description:
CTRL BASE ZERO is a brief, moody experience, with light environmental puzzles and the tantalizing hint of a story.

With a heavy emphasis on rich sound design, minimalist architecture, and a palette that is (mostly) black and white, it's a tasty gameplay morsel that you'll remember after finishing it.

Controls are WASD + Mouse. You can adjust mouse sensitivity in the game menu, accessed by pressing Escape.
